source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as recordCount from SalesLt.Customer

ifTrueActivities.name: Copy data and create customer copy

sink.preCopyScript:
IF EXISTS (Select * from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME='Customer_Copy')
TRUNCATE TABLE SalesLT.Customer_Copy
ELSE 
Select * into SalesLT.Customer_Copy from SalesLT.Customer

source.sqlReaderQuery: select  c.FirstName,c.LastName ,sa.addresstype, ad.addressLine1 from [SalesLt].[Customer] as  c  join [SalesLt].[CustomerAddress] as sa on c.CustomerID=sa.CustomerID Inner Join [SalesLt].[Address] as ad on sa.addressid = ad.addressid
select count(*) as recordCount from SalesLt.Address
select count(*) AS recordCount from SalesLt.Product
